description.value: Comrade in Cohesion assists in reloading the Character's currently equipped weapon. This can be used in combination with the Character's own actions. For example, if a weapon requires 2 Full Actions to reload, both the Character and Comrade can use their Full Action to reload it in 1 Turn.
